adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: anyscale-group-1

additional_kwargs.title: Additional kwargs
additional_kwargs.description: Additional kwargs to pass to the model.

api_base.title: API Base
api_base.description: Base URL for the AnyScale API. Change it from the default if you are using a custom deployment.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: API Key for the AnyScale API.

max_tokens.title: Maximum Output Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of output tokens to limit LLM replies, maximum possible varies from model to model.

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries to attempt when a request fails.
